description:
## 2024-07-22 `1.37.1`

#### ğŸ› Bug fixes

- Removed `placement` property of the `Toast` component. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added the property `onClose` to `Toast` component. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-07-18 `1.1.0`

#### ğŸ› Bug fixes

- Removed `placement` property of the `Toast` component, it is defined at `Toast.provider`. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/79) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added the property `onClose` to `Toast` component. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/79) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-07-18 `4.0.1`

#### ğŸ› Bug fixes

- Adjusted color of the light theme `color-light-surface["brand-subdued"]` token. ([#72](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/72) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
